title: Smart Data models -RevenueCollection schema",
description: A Data Model for city revenue collection operations.

totalCount.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Count of the revenue collection service corresponding to this observation.

rcRecoveryAmount.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Amount collected towards Registration Certificate on monthly basis from the establishment per emplyoee.

ecRecoveryAmount.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Amount collected towards Enrollment Certificate from the establishment on annual basis.

year.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Year corresponding to this observation and is described in YYYY format, for eg. '2020'.

date.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Date corresponding to this observation and is described in YYYY-MM-DD format, for eg. '2020-11-01'.

month.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Month corresponding to this observation and is described in MM format, for eg. '05' for the month of May.

revenueCollectionType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Type of source from which the city administration collects the revenue, could be property tax, vehicle registration, party hall booking, community hall booking, auditorium booking etc.

vehicleTypeCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.The code for vehicleType corresponding to this observation. For eg.- '1' - MOPED/SCOOTER, '2' - MOTOR CYCLE, '4' - PRIVATE MOTOR CAR/JEEP CAR, '21' - TEMPO, '26' - BUS, etc.

amountCollected.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Amount collected towards the service corresponding to this observation.

vehicleType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Describes the type of vehicle corresponding to this observation, could be hopper, compactor, tipper, dumper in case of solid waste management vehicles, BRT mini bus, BRT bus, city bus in case of ITMS vehicles, Ambulance, Fire tender, Police van etc, in case of emergency vehicles and Moped/Scooter, Motor Cycle, Autorickshaw, Private car/ Jeep car, Tempo, Bus, E-Moped/E-Scooter/E-Motor Cycle, Public motor in case of vehicle registration.

municipalityInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Municipality information corresponding to this observation.

district.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.District name corresponding to this observation.

ulbName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Name of the Urban Local Body corresponding to this observation.

cityID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.City ID corresponding to this observation.

stateName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Name of the state corresponding to this observation.

cityName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.City name corresponding to this observation.

zoneID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Zone ID corresponding to this observation.

wardNum.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ward number corresponding to this observation.
